Title: The Covenant
Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Actors: Steven Strait, Laura Ramsey, Sebastian Stan, Taylor Kitsch
Plot: Four best friends, young warlocks of the same coven who all share a same secret: a magic powers, suddenly have to protect themselves from a stranger-another warlock just like them who has come to town to destroy their coven after a 300 years old hate...
Production: Screen Gems, Sandstorm Films, Lakeshore Entertainment
